Ironjawz Double Cabbage (Age of Sigmar) [1,995pts]

  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Destruction - Orruk Warclans) [1,995pts]

    • Core Battalion

      • Core Battalion: Warlord

        Selections: Extra Enhancement: Mount Trait

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Magnificent, Strategist, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Warlord


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Magnificent When you pick enhancements for your army (see 27.3), you can pick 1 extra enhancement.
        Strategist Once per battle, when you receive command points at the start of your hero phase, you can receive 1 extra command point.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Warlord 1-2 Commanders
        2-4 Sub-commanders
        1-2 Troops

      • Orruk Warclans Core Battalion: Ironjawz Fist

        Categories: Core Battalion, Orruk Core Battalion, Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Slayers, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Ironjawz Fist


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Slayers Once per battle, 1 unit from this battalion can receive the All-out Attack or Unleash Hell command without the command being issued and without a command point being spent.
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Ironjawz Fist 2-5 IRONJAWZ Troops

    • Leader [1,395pts]

      • Megaboss on Maw-krusha [480pts]

        Selections: Amulet of Destiny, Boss Choppa and Rip-toof Fist, Damage Table, General, Innard-bursting Bellow, Mega Bossy, Mighty Fists and Tail, Tough 'Un, Warlord - 1-2 Commanders

        Categories: Leader, IRONJAWZ, DESTRUCTION, Behemoth, HERO, ORRUK, MAW-KRUSHA, MEGABOSS, ORRUK WARCLANS, MONSTER, Artefact, General

        Artefact: Amulet of Destiny, Command Trait: Mega Bossy, Mount Trait: Tough 'Un, Unit: Megaboss on Maw-krusha (Boss Choppa and Rip-toof Fist), Unit Abilities: Destructive Bulk, Fly, Skull-shaking Bellow, Strength from Victory, Weapon: Boss Choppa and Rip-toof Fist, Innard-bursting Bellow, Mighty Fists and Tail, Wounds Suffered: 00-06, 07-12, 13-16, 17+


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Amulet of Destiny The bearer has a ward of 5+.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Mega Bossy This general can issue the Mighty Destroyers command even if it has already been been issued by another friendly model in the same phase.
        Mount Trait Mount Trait Details Ref
        Tough 'Un MONSTER only. Unless this model has a number of wounds allocated to it that exceeds half its Wounds characteristic, use the top row on its damage table, regardless of how many wounds it has suffered.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Megaboss on Maw-krusha (Boss Choppa and Rip-toof Fist) *1883+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Destructive Bulk If you carry out a Stomp montrous rampage with this unit and the enemy unit you picked suffers any mortal wounds, that enemy unit suffers an additional number of mortal wounds equal to the Destructive Bulk value on this unit's damage table. After all models slain by those mortal wounds have been removed from play, if there are no enemy models within 3" of this unit, you can move this unit D6" and then you can carry out another Stomp monstrous rampage with this unit even though you have already carried out the Stomp monstrous rampage in that phase.
        Fly A Maw-krusha can fly.
        Skull-shaking Bellow When you pick this unit to issue a command, you can pick up to 3 friendly IRONJAWZ units to recieve the command instead of only 1 friendly unit.
        Strength from Victory At the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, add 1 to this model’s Wounds characteristic and add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons, excluding those of its mount.

        • Arcane Tome

          Selections: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield

          Categories: Artefact

          Artefact: Arcane Tome, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Arcane Tome The bearer becomes a WIZARD that knows the Arcane Bolt and Mystic Shield spells. They can attempt to cast 1 spell in your hero phase and attempt to unbind 1 spell in the enemy hero phase. If the bearer is already a Wizard, they can attempt to cast 1 additional spell instead.
        Mount Trait Mount Trait Details Ref
        Fast 'Un Once per battle, in your hero phase, this model can make a normal move.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Flaming Weapon 4Pick 1 of the caster's melee weapons. Add 1 to Damage characteristic of that weapon until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

      • Orruk Warchanter [115pts]

        Selections: 1. Get 'Em Beat, Gorkstikk and Morkstikk, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, ORRUK, IRONJAWZ, HERO, TOTEM, Leader, 9 or less wounds Leader, WARCHANTER, ORRUK WARCLANS

        Unit: Orruk Warchanter, Unit Abilities: Get 'Em Beat, Violent Fury, Warbeats, Weapon: Gorkstikk and Morkstikk


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Orruk Warchanter 4"674+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Get 'Em Beat This warbeat can be attempted at the start of your charge phase. If the attempt is successful, pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of this unit. In that charge phase, you can attempt to charge with that friendly IRONJAWZ if it is within 18" of the enemy instead of 12". In addition, roll 3D6 instead of 2D6 when making a charge roll for that unit in that charge phase.
        Violent Fury In your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 15" of this model. Until your next hero phase, add 1 to the damage inflicted by attacks made with melee weapons by that unit. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase.
        Warbeats When this unit attempts its warbeat, roll a dice. On a 3+, the attempt is successful. This unit cannot attempt a warbeat that has been attempted by another friendly unit in the same turn.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Gorkstikk and Morkstikk Melee1"63+3+-D3

        Selections: Da Great Big Green Hand of Gork, Waaagh! Staff, Warlord - 2-4 Sub-Commanders

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, ORRUK, IRONJAWZ, HERO, WIZARD, Leader, WEIRDNOB SHAMAN, 9 or less wounds Leader, ORRUK WARCLANS

        Magic: Orruk Weirdnob Shaman, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Da Great Big Green Hand of Gork, Green Puke, Mystic Shield, Unit: Orruk Weirdnob Shaman, Unit Abilities: Brutal Power, Weapon: Waaagh! Staff


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Orruk Weirdnob Shaman 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Green Puke
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Da Great Big Green Hand of Gork 712"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly ORRUK unit wholly within range, visible to the caster and more than 3" from all enemy units. Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy units. It cannot move in the following movement phase.
        Green Puke 6Green Puke has a casting value of 8. Draw a straight line 2D6" long from the mouth of the Shaman. Each enemy unit crossed by the line suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Orruk Weirdnob Shaman 4"665+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Brutal Power If this unit is within 12" of 10 or more other friendly IRONJAWZ models at the end of your hero phase, it can attempt to cast the Green Puke spell in addition to any other spells it can cast, and even if a WIZARD has already attempted to cast the Green Puke spell in that hero phase.

      • Orruk Gore-Gruntas [150pts]

        Selections: 3 Gore-Gruntas [150pts], Jagged Gore-hacka, Tusks and Hooves, Warlord - 1-2 Troops

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, ORRUK, IRONJAWZ, Other, ORRUK WARCLANS, GORE GRUNTAS, Battleline

        Unit: Orruk Gore-Gruntas, Unit Abilities: Champion, Gore-Grunta Charge, Weapon: Jagged Gore-hacka, Tusks and Hooves


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Orruk Gore-Gruntas 9"564+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Champion 1 model in this unit can be a Gore-grunta Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons, excluding those of its mount.
        Gore-Grunta Charge After a model in this unit finishes a charge move, roll a dice for each enemy unit with 1" of that model. Add 1 to the roll if the model is armed with a Jagged Gore-hacka. On a 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

        If this unit has more than 1 model, roll to determine if mortal wounds are caused after each model finishes its charge move, but do not allocate the mortal wounds until after all of the models in this unit have finished their charge moves.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Orruk Warclans

          • Ironjawz

            Selections: Bloodtoofs

            Battle Trait: Hunt and Crush, Ironjawz Waaagh!, Smashing and Bashing, Command Abilities: Mighty Destroyer


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Hunt and Crush At the end of the combat phase, friendly BLOODTOOFS GORE-GRUNTAS units that fought in that phase and are within 3" of any enemy units can make a pile-in move. In addition, those that fought but are not within 3" of any enemy units can each make a normal move or attempt a charge.
        Ironjawz Waaagh! Once per battle, at the start of your charge phase, you can pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ general on the battlefield and say that they are calling an Ironjawz Waaagh!. Until the end of that turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly IRONJAWZ units and improve the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly IRONJAWZ units by 1.
        Smashing and Bashing In the combat phase, after a friendly IRONJAWZ unit has fought, if any enemy units were destroyed by an attack made by that unit, you can pick 1 friendly IRONJAWZ unit that has not yet fought in that combat phase and that is within 3" of an enemy unit. That friendly IRONJAWZ unit fights immediately.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Mighty Destroyer You can use this command ability in your hero phase. The model that issues the command must be an IRONJAWZ model and the unit that receives the command must be an IRONJAWZ unit.

        - If the unit that received the command is more than 12" from all enemy units, you must make a normal move with the unit.

        - If the unit that received the command is within 3" of an enemy unit, you must make a pile-in move with each model in the unit.

        - If the unit is within 12" of an enemy unit and more than 3" from all enemy units, you must attempt a charge with the unit.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Hold the Line

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Hold the Line


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Hold the Line When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any Battleline units from your starting army on the battlefield.
